BINOMIAL_COEF_T binomial_coef ( long  k,
long  n 
)

binomial_coef(k,n) = n! / k!(n-k)! = (n (n-1) (n-2) ... (n-k+1))/(k!)

Definition at line 210 of file math_implementation.h.

FMB_INLINE void complex_Log ( complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT  p  ) 

With c = r.exp(i.t) (where i^2 = -1), we have:
log(c) = log(r) + i.t, where log(r) is the log with base e of r.
So with cartesian coordinates :
log((x,y) = log(sqrt(x^2 + y^2)) + i.arctan(y/x)

p = log(*p)

Definition at line 222 of file math_implementation.h.

References angle_Compute_from_cartesian().

FMB_CONST complex_t *FMB_RESTRICT  p2
